```{r setup}
library(parlrdev)
```

```{r}
nA <- 100000000
nB <- 800
P <- 700

################# Sadinle Method ################

# Sampling from MANY values with unequal weights is HARD
Zsamp <- sapply(1:nB, function(x){
  sample(1:nA, size = 1, replace = TRUE, prob = 1:nA)
})

################ parlr Method ###################

# Sampling from FEWER values with unequal weights is EASY
Zsamp <- sapply(1:nB, function(x){
  sample(1:P, size = 1, replace = TRUE, prob = 1:P)
})

# Sampling from many values with EQUAL weights is EASY
Zsamp <- sapply(1:nB, function(x){
  sample(1:nA, size = 1, replace = TRUE, prob = NULL)
})
```
